internalMessage.title: Test Data for HRIS-386
internalMessage.description:
Title: HRIS UPDATES AS OF 02-02-2021


Hi All,


﻿These are all the recent HRIS updates deployed in the live as of 02/02/2021. Please see full details below. 


Thanks!


Note: This announcement will be updated everyday if there are recent changes in the live server.﻿

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



RECENT HRIS UPDATES AS OF 02/02/2021


----------------------------------------------------------------- [DASHBOARD] -----------------------------------------------------------------



﻿1. Dashboard Graph Count Improvement


   → bar graph per company, location, department and designation can now be seen in the dashboard


2. Dashboard Employee Count Improvement


   → displays count of the following:


    Location

   Company

   Status

   Employee Per Project

3. Upcoming Leave Improvements


   →  Change name to “Upcoming Leaves”


   → Leaves to be displayed is default this week


   → Filter selection for weekly and monthly


   → Design the upcoming leave as a datatable and can navigate records thru pages


   → will remove the pagination number filter (to be implemented)



4. Display Requests On Leave Today Based Requested Date


   → Displays employees’ leave request within the from and to requested date


   → The date of leave column displays the from and to date of the requests.


5. Disabled Employee in Birthday


    → Disabled employees should not be displayed in the birthday table.


6. Multiple Tagging of Projects To Employee


    → employees can now have tagging of projects, can be set up by admin/superuser only in Settings -> Employees -> Employee Project Tagging



 


----------------------------------------------------------------- [ALL REQUESTS] -----------------------------------------------------------------


1. Admin Role Can View All Filed Requests Of Employee


   → Rename the 'All Requests' to 'Request Application


   → Added new sub item "All Requests" for viewing all requests of the employee


2. All Request List Improvement & Sorting of Date in All Request Table


   → Can now be filtered by today, weekly, yearly, monthly, and range.


   → default leave record to be displayed is today.


   → has specific rule for viewing per role:


        * CEO/President & Super User:


           → can view all employee's leave record in the system, regardless of which company.


        * Admin:


           → can view only employee's leave record with the same company as the current admin logged in.


        * Employee:


           → can view only their own leave record.


   → Added new column (time) for specific requests


   → Added eye icon to view the status and full application details of the employee's request


   → change the date requested and date submitted format from (Month DD, YYYY) to YYYY-MM-DD to fix the sorting of dates.



3. Active & Inactive Employees


   → can now filter active and inactive employees to be display in the All requests page.





----------------------------------------------------------------- [EMPLOYEES] -----------------------------------------------------------------


1. Auto Create Leave Points Record


   → when creating new employees, there will be a new tab in the form that will be required to setup the leave points and approver of the new employee.


2. Employee Gender


   → adding new employees or editing employees can now select their gender


   → applies to Employee Profile (other personal details card)


 


----------------------------------------------------------------- [PROFILES] -----------------------------------------------------------------


1. Not Required Description in Attachment Profile


   → the description field when uploading attachments in profile is now optional


2. Delete Function in Attachment


   → fix the filenames with same name to avoid system confusion


   → attachments can be deleted




----------------------------------------------------------------- [TIME LOGS] -----------------------------------------------------------------



1. Incorrect Date In Time logs


   → dates of time logs record is now fixed. [BEFORE - current date is always displayed] - [NOW - the correct date of the record should be displayed]


 


----------------------------------------------------------------- [REQUEST APPLICATION] -----------------------------------------------------------------


1. Emergency Leave Improvements


   → attachment field in emergency leave is now optional, but still required in sick leave.


2. Button for Re-sending Email Request To Approver


   → New button to re-send the email if the approver didn't received or filed up some other mails


   → can only be clicked once a day


3. Not Receiving Any Email Notification


   → fixed the issue by changing the email from queue to direct mail


4. Records in Other Pages In For My Approval Tab Cannot Cancel and Revert


   → fixed the issue for other records on page 2 and up cannot be reverted and cancelled.


5. Proper Error Message For No Leave Points Policy


   → proper error message to be displayed if employee haven't set up leave points




6. Success & Error Message For Resending Request


   → fixed and improved success and error message for resent button.


         → can only resent email request notification once per day



7. Cancelling Requests Additional Improvements


   → When cancelling request, it is now required to enter a cancellation notes/reason.


         → minimum: 20 and maximum 150 characters


         → inputted cancellation notes will be displayed in the details


   → Cancelled requests will not be removed from the requestor's and approver's table


         → the status will be tagged as "Cancelled"


         → the cancelled request can still be viewed


         → revert and lightning button will be removed from the approver's side



9. Expired Leave Requests


   → Request can now have an Expired status


         → Expired if date submitted is after a month


         → and without approved/declined from all approver levels




   → Expired requests can still be viewed.


10. Reverted and Cancelled Requests


   → cancelled requests will be removed from the time logs.




11. Offset Improvements


   → when viewing the offset request details, you can now view the following;


       → can view the overtime record used


       → the date, time, and duration


       → and the overtime record's reason


 


----------------------------------------------------------------- [ADMINISTRATION] -----------------------------------------------------------------


1. Forgot Password For HRIS


   → forgot password button is now working in the HRIS Login page. old rules still applies.


2. Viewing Company Details UI Issue


   → fixed the design when viewing company details


3. Filter Dropdown Field Shows Deleted Records


   → fixed the issue regarding deleted records in company, department, and designation still displaying in the dropdown fields.


4. Disabling An Account That Has An Active Session Should Be Forced Logout


   → disabling a currently logged in account will be forced logout upon refreshing or navigating to other page. and cannot login or use the forgot password anymore.


5. User Activities Logs


   → HRIS now has a user activity logs. You can view here the following:


        → dashboard for UAL


        → the count of create, update, delete, recover, logged in


        → can be filtered by date range, users, roles and activities


        → will also display the users who logged in, logged out, and done some activities in the table




----------------------------------------------------------------- [SETTINGS] -----------------------------------------------------------------



1. Deleting Records in Settings


   → Add validation for records to be deleted


       → check if the record to be deleted is active or is using by the employee.


            → if not used, then the record will be deleted.




NOTES:


IF THERE ARE ANY ISSUES, ERRORS, GLITCHES, BUGS, AND IMPROVEMENTS REGARDING THE HRIS. KINDLY MESSAGE SIR RALPHY, THE DEVS (Esther Shari Conwi & Samantha Siao), QA (Pinky Escasinas), AND THE ADMINS.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Regards,


Escasinas, Pinky F.


Main HRIS QA 

eto update info

internalMessage.title: EDSA Revolution Anniversary
internalMessage.description:
Hi All, 

In reference to Proclamation No. 986 declaring February 25, 2021, as a Special Non-Working Holiday in observance of the Anniversary of the EDSA People Power Revolution. 

Thank you!

internalMessage.title: HRIS UPDATES AS OF 02-02-2021
internalMessage.description:
﻿Hi All,

﻿These are all the recent HRIS updates deployed in the live as of 02/02/2021. Please see full details below. 

Thanks.

Note: This announcement will be updated everyday if there are recent changes in the live server.﻿
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

RECENT HRIS UPDATES AS OF 02/02/2021

----------------------------------------------------------------- [DASHBOARD] -----------------------------------------------------------------

﻿1. Dashboard Graph Count Improvement

   → bar graph per company, location, department and designation can now be seen in the dashboard

2. Dashboard Employee Count Improvement

   → displays count of the following:

  •     Location
  •    Company
  •    Status
  •    Employee Per Project

3. Upcoming Leave Improvements

   →  Change name to “Upcoming Leaves”

   → Leaves to be displayed is default this week

   → Filter selection for weekly and monthly

   → Design the upcoming leave as a datatable and can navigate records thru pages

   → will remove the pagination number filter (to be implemented)

4. Display Requests On Leave Today Based Requested Date

   → Displays employees’ leave request within the from and to requested date

   → The date of leave column displays the from and to date of the requests.

5. Disabled Employee in Birthday

    → Disabled employees should not be displayed in the birthday table.

6. Multiple Tagging of Projects To Employee

    → employees can now have tagging of projects, can be set up by admin/superuser only in Settings -> Employees -> Employee Project Tagging

 

----------------------------------------------------------------- [ALL REQUESTS] -----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Admin Role Can View All Filed Requests Of Employee

   → Rename the 'All Requests' to 'Request Application

   → Added new sub item "All Requests" for viewing all requests of the employee

2. All Request List Improvement & Sorting of Date in All Request Table

   → Can now be filtered by today, weekly, yearly, monthly, and range.

   → default leave record to be displayed is today.

   → has specific rule for viewing per role:

        * CEO/President & Super User:

           → can view all employee's leave record in the system, regardless of which company.

        * Admin:

           → can view only employee's leave record with the same company as the current admin logged in.

        * Employee:

           → can view only their own leave record.

   → Added new column (time) for specific requests

   → Added eye icon to view the status and full application details of the employee's request

   → change the date requested and date submitted format from (Month DD, YYYY) to YYYY-MM-DD to fix the sorting of dates.

3. Active & Inactive Employees

   → can now filter active and inactive employees to be display in the All requests page.


----------------------------------------------------------------- [EMPLOYEES] -----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Auto Create Leave Points Record

   → when creating new employees, there will be a new tab in the form that will be required to setup the leave points and approver of the new employee.

2. Employee Gender

   → adding new employees or editing employees can now select their gender

   → applies to Employee Profile (other personal details card)

 

----------------------------------------------------------------- [PROFILES] -----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Not Required Description in Attachment Profile

   → the description field when uploading attachments in profile is now optional

2. Delete Function in Attachment

   → fix the filenames with same name to avoid system confusion

   → attachments can be deleted


----------------------------------------------------------------- [TIME LOGS] -----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Incorrect Date In Time logs

   → dates of time logs record is now fixed. [BEFORE - current date is always displayed] - [NOW - the correct date of the record should be displayed]

 

----------------------------------------------------------------- [REQUEST APPLICATION] -----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Emergency Leave Improvements

   → attachment field in emergency leave is now optional, but still required in sick leave.

2. Button for Re-sending Email Request To Approver

   → New button to re-send the email if the approver didn't received or filed up some other mails

   → can only be clicked once a day

3. Not Receiving Any Email Notification

   → fixed the issue by changing the email from queue to direct mail

4. Records in Other Pages In For My Approval Tab Cannot Cancel and Revert

   → fixed the issue for other records on page 2 and up cannot be reverted and cancelled.

5. Proper Error Message For No Leave Points Policy

   → proper error message to be displayed if employee haven't set up leave points


6. Success & Error Message For Resending Request

   → fixed and improved success and error message for resent button.

         → can only resent email request notification once per day

7. Cancelling Requests Additional Improvements

   → When cancelling request, it is now required to enter a cancellation notes/reason.

         → minimum: 20 and maximum 150 characters

         → inputted cancellation notes will be displayed in the details

   → Cancelled requests will not be removed from the requestor's and approver's table

         → the status will be tagged as "Cancelled"

         → the cancelled request can still be viewed

         → revert and lightning button will be removed from the approver's side

9. Expired Leave Requests

   → Request can now have an Expired status

         → Expired if date submitted is after a month

         → and without approved/declined from all approver levels


   → Expired requests can still be viewed.

10. Reverted and Cancelled Requests

   → cancelled requests will be removed from the time logs.


11. Offset Improvements

   → when viewing the offset request details, you can now view the following;

       → can view the overtime record used

       → the date, time, and duration

       → and the overtime record's reason

 

----------------------------------------------------------------- [ADMINISTRATION] -----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Forgot Password For HRIS

   → forgot password button is now working in the HRIS Login page. old rules still applies.

2. Viewing Company Details UI Issue

   → fixed the design when viewing company details

3. Filter Dropdown Field Shows Deleted Records

   → fixed the issue regarding deleted records in company, department, and designation still displaying in the dropdown fields.

4. Disabling An Account That Has An Active Session Should Be Forced Logout

   → disabling a currently logged in account will be forced logout upon refreshing or navigating to other page. and cannot login or use the forgot password anymore.

5. User Activities Logs

   → HRIS now has a user activity logs. You can view here the following:

        → dashboard for UAL

        → the count of create, update, delete, recover, logged in

        → can be filtered by date range, users, roles and activities

        → will also display the users who logged in, logged out, and done some activities in the table


----------------------------------------------------------------- [SETTINGS] -----------------------------------------------------------------

1. Deleting Records in Settings

   → Add validation for records to be deleted

       → check if the record to be deleted is active or is using by the employee.

            → if not used, then the record will be deleted.


NOTES:

IF THERE ARE ANY ISSUES, ERRORS, GLITCHES, BUGS, AND IMPROVEMENTS REGARDING THE HRIS. KINDLY MESSAGE SIR RALPHY, THE DEVS (Esther Shari Conwi & Samantha Siao), QA (Pinky Escasinas), AND THE ADMINS.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Regards,

Escasinas, Pinky F.

Main HRIS QA

internalMessage.title: HRIS GUIDES FOR ALL EMPLOYEES
internalMessage.description:
Hi All!

﻿Welcome to the HRIS guidelines and tutorials for all employees. Please see full details below.

Thanks!

Note: This announcement may change depends if their are any changes or updates in the HRIS.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

UPDATING OWN PROFILE

1. Navigate to your profile by clicking your name on the upper right corner, then click the "View Profile".

2. To edit the following:

  • Pencil Icon → to edit the selected record
  • Plus icon → to add a new record
  • Trash icon → to delete the selected record

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CHANGING PASSWORD

1. To change your password, click your name on the upper right corner, then click the "Change Password".

2. Fill up the required fields (*).

  • Your Password → enter your current password
  • New Password → enter your new password
  • Retype Password → retype your new password

Note: You cannot use your current password as your new password. And also follows a password criteria (uppercase, lowercase, number, special characters). 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

APPLYING FOR ANY REQUEST

1. To apply for a request, click the "Employees" on the sidebar, then "Request Application", lastly select request type you want to apply for.

2. Click the "Apply [Request Type]" button then fill up the required fields (*).

3. Click "Submit" you should be able to receive an email notification regarding your request. And will also send an email notification to your approver.


NOTES:

IF THERE ARE ANY ISSUES, ERRORS, GLITCHES, BUGS, AND IMPROVEMENTS REGARDING THE HRIS. KINDLY MESSAGE THE DEVS (Esther Shari Conwi & Samantha Siao), QA (Pinky Escasinas), AND THE ADMINS.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Regards,

Escasinas, Pinky F.

Main HRIS QA

internalMessage.title: HRIS GUIDES FOR ADMINS
internalMessage.description:
Hi Admins!

﻿Welcome to the HRIS guidelines and tutorials for admin role. Please see full details below.

Thanks!

Note: This announcement may change depends if their are any changes or updates in the HRIS.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREATING NEW EMPLOYEE

1. Navigate to the Employees → All Employees in the sidebar or navbar

2. Click "New Employee" button, then fill up the required fields (*).

  • If the option is not available in the listed dropdown fields, you can modify it in the link provided below
    • Company Name → https://hris.go3global.com/administration/companies
    • Designation → https://hris.go3global.com/administration/designations
      • If department for the designation is not listed, modify here → https://hris.go3global.com/administration/departments
    • Employment Method → https://hris.go3global.com/settings/jobs/employmentModes
    • Shift Schedule → https://hris.go3global.com/settings/jobs/shifts

3. After filling up all the required fields, click "Submit" button. It will send an email account information to the work email of the employee.

4. Search for the newly created employee's name, then click the name to be navigated in its profile (if no result, refresh the page).

5. Update the employee's address (mandatory) and other information.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Before an employee can file a request, their leave points policy and approver levels should be set up first. To do that, follow the instruction below.

Note:

New employees or under probationary might experience this kind of issue in the HRIS when filing for a request.

1. Error Occurred → No leave points policy set up

2. Approver level is not set up yet → No approver levels set up


SETTING UP EMPLOYEE'S LEAVE POINTS

1. Navigate to Settings → Requests → Leave Points

2. Click "Add Leave Points Policy", then fill up the required fields, you can also setup multiple employees with same leave points policy.

  • If the employee is not found, this employee might be under probationary. Work around for this issue is to:
    • Change the employee's role from probationary to regular
    • Set up leave points policy; then
    • Change back role from regular to probationary

3. Click "Submit"

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SETTING UP EMPLOYEE'S APPROVERS AND LEVELS

1. Navigate to Settings → Requests → Approval Setup

2. Click "Max Approver Setup", then click "New Max Approver"

3. Fill up the required fields, you can also setup multiple employees with same approvers.

  • If employee is not found in the approver name field, you can modify it in here → https://hris.go3global.com/settings/requests/levels
  • Watch the video here:
  • https://drive.google.com/file/d/19Il_osobyu_BDhZoBztkzXJsrrNC8Iac/view

4. Click "Submit"

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

DISABLING EMPLOYEE

1. Navigate to the Employees → All Employees in the sidebar or navbar

2. Click the pencil icon to edit an employee.

3. Click "Next" until you reach the Account Details.

4. Change the Status from Enabled to Disabled, then fill up the required fields for disabling employees.

5. Click "Finish" and this user's account should be disabled and she won't be able to logged in the HRIS anymore.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


NOTES:

IF THERE ARE ANY ISSUES, ERRORS, GLITCHES, BUGS, AND IMPROVEMENTS REGARDING THE HRIS. KINDLY MESSAGE THE DEVS (Esther Shari Conwi & Samantha Siao), QA (Pinky Escasinas), AND THE ADMINS.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Regards,

Escasinas, Pinky F.

Main HRIS QA
